item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Pothole larger than dinner plate in middle of road, 27th March
item.description:
This pot hole is difficult to miss because it is in the middle of the road and you hit it going in both directions. It is right outside the glass centre…
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 27th March
item.description:
Customer states several drains in area have not been cleaned in several years, resulting in flooding in low lying area when it rains
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really deep pothole causing vehicle to swerve, 27th March
item.description:
This pothole is very bad and it’s right in the drivers pathway and causes drivers to swerve into the middle of the road into oncoming traffic. I had somebody coming onto my lane trying to avoid it the other day. Please fix it as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Old Bath Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in road, 27th March
item.description:
Large pothole in road surface of Thirlestaine Road, Cheltenham, near junction with Old Bath Road. Pothole is near the side of the road on the painted double yellow lines, heading west from the roundabout on Old Bath Road. This pothole poses a danger to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thirlestaine Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
